findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade in Receive Ether function
findings.description: The Receive Ether function allows unauthorized script upgrades, potentially leading to malicious code execution.

findings.description: The distributeDividends function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to call it.

findings.description: The withdrawDividend function does not have any access control or restrictions, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the contract's funds.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
